Paragraph: As reported before , a broad diffraction peak was observed at approximately 20.5 ° in the diffraction of powdery PCZDTB ( see Supporting Information ).

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As reported before , a broad diffraction peak was observed at approximately 20.5 ° in the diffraction of powdery PCZDTB ( see Supporting Information ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| approximately 20.5 ° |
| powdery PCZDTB |

Note: In this context, "approximately 20.5 °" can be considered a material property as it refers to the position of a diffraction peak, which is a characteristic property of a material. "Powdery PCZDTB" is also a material property as it describes the physical state of the material being referred to.
